name: Absorb
description:
This time, you are a slime with nothing. 

No weapons, no jumping skills, no sense of touch, no sound, and even no sight. 

Luckily, you can ABSORB other creatures and STEAL their skills. Can you take the advantages of that and grow step by step? You begin from zero, but where will your end be? 

Well, here goes “nothing”.

You will move on a large map, and there will be no evil “levels” to take away or reset your abilities. All you have to do is to make the most of what you have and keep looking for the next skill. 

You will encounter: 

9 completely different creatures that can be your prey (Which means 9 distinct abilities!)

3 exciting and interesting boss battles

Good luck, slime with nothing!
